tictactoeproject

Class TicTacToe

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoeproject.TicTacToe

  • public class TicTacToe
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple tic-tac-toe game The program prints a 3 x 3 board on the screen User(s) are prompted to select a numbered space to mark with either X or O If three contiguous spaces are marked with the same symbol in a row, column, or diagonally, player wins
    Author:
    Daniel Pereira

      This method prints the game board with all updated changes and player markings

      This method returns true if the user wins with 3 contiguous symbols diagonally
